mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (
) TABLA_COUNT

SELECT A.N_ID_ACTOR, A.C_NOMACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, A.C_DNIACTOR, A.C_RUCACTOR, A.D_FECNACIMIENTOACTOR, A.C_LUGNACIMIENTOACTOR, A.C_INFOCONTACTO, A.C_CARGOACTOR, B.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO AS PARAMENTRO_TIPO_ACTOR FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_PARAMETRO B ON A.C_TIPO_ACTOR = B.VALOR_PARAMETRO AND B.PADRE_PARAMETRO = 20 INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD_ACTOR C ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = C.N_ID_ACTOR WHERE C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD =#{id} AND C.C_ESTADO_ACTI_ACTOR = 'ACT'

SELECT DISTINCT A.N_ID_ACTOR, A.C_NOMACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, A.C_DNIACTOR, A.C_RUCACTOR, A.D_FECNACIMIENTOACTOR, A.C_LUGNACIMIENTOACTOR, A.C_INFOCONTACTO, A.C_CARGOACTOR, C.C_ESTADO_ACTI_ACTOR, C.C_COMENT_ACTI_ACTOR, C.C_DEMAN_ACTI_ACTOR, C.C_POS_ACTI_ACTOR, C.N_NIVEL_AD, C.C_TIPO_ROL FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD_ACTOR C ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = C.N_ID_ACTOR WHERE C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD =#{id}

SELECT A.C_NOMACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, A.N_ID_ACTOR FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTOR_ACUERDO B ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = B.N_ID_ACTOR WHERE B.C_INDTIPOACTORACUERDO = 'INI' AND B.N_ID_ACUERDO =#{id} AND B.C_ESTACTORACUERDO = 'ACT'

SELECT A.C_NOMACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, A.N_ID_ACTOR FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTOR_ACUERDO B ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = B.N_ID_ACTOR WHERE B.C_INDTIPOACTORACUERDO = 'FIN' AND B.N_ID_ACUERDO =#{id} AND B.C_ESTACTORACUERDO = 'ACT'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SIMCO_REG_ACTOR ( N_ID_ACTOR,
C_APELLIDOPATACTOR,
C_APELLIDOMATACTOR,
C_SEXO,
C_DIRECCIONACTOR,
C_TELEFONOACTOR,
C_EMAILACTOR,
C_ANEXOACTOR,
C_RUCACTOR,
D_FECNACIMIENTOACTOR,
C_LUGNACIMIENTOACTOR,
C_INFOCONTACTO,
C_CARGOACTOR,
C_IDDEPARTAMENTO,
C_IDPROVINCIA,
C_IDDISTRITO,
C_EMPRESATIPO,
C_ENTIDADTIPO,
C_EMPRESAAMBITO,
C_OBSERVACIONES,
C_DNIACTOR,
C_TIPOGENERAL,
C_TIPOPOBLACION,
C_SUBTIPO1POBLACION,
C_SUBTIPO2POBLACION,
C_TIPOESTADO,
C_SUBTIPO1ESTADO,
C_SUBTIPO2ESTADO,
C_TIPOEMPRESA,
C_SUBTIPO1EMPRESA,
C_SUBTIPO2EMPRESA,
C_TIPOORGANIZACION,
C_SUBTIPO1ORGANIZACION,
C_SUBTIPO2ORGANIZACION,
C_SUBTIPO3EMPRESA,
C_CLASIFICACION,
D_FECHAREGISTRO,
C_USUREGISTRO,
C_NOMACTOR
) VALUES ( SEQ_SIMCO_REGISTRO_ACTOR.NextVal,
#{apellidoPat},
#{apellidoMat},
#{sexo},
#{direccion},
#{telefono},
#{email},
#{anexo},
#{ruc},
#{fechaNacimiento},
#{lugarNacimiento},
#{infoContacto},
#{cargo},
#{idDepartamento},
#{idProvincia},
#{idDistrito},
#{empresaTipo},
#{entidadTipo},
#{empresaAmbito},
#{observaciones},
#{dni},
#{tipoGeneral},
#{tipoPoblacion},
#{subTipo1Poblacion},
#{subTipo2Poblacion},
#{tipoEstado},
#{subTipo1Estado},
#{subTipo2Estado},
#{tipoEmpresa},
#{subTipo1Empresa},
#{subTipo2Empresa},
#{tipoOrganizacion},
#{subTipo1Organizacion},
#{subTipo2Organizacion},
#{subTipo3Empresa},
#{clasificacion},
#{fechaRegistro},
#{usuarioRegistro},
#{nombre} )
SELECT SEQ_SIMCO_REGISTRO_ACTOR.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.update:
UPDATE SIMCO_REG_ACTOR
C_APELLIDOPATACTOR= #{apellidoPat},
C_APELLIDOMATACTOR= #{apellidoMat},
C_DNIACTOR=#{dni},
C_RUCACTOR=#{ruc},
D_FECNACIMIENTOACTOR=#{fechaNacimiento},
C_SEXO=#{sexo},
C_DIRECCIONACTOR=#{direccion},
C_TELEFONOACTOR=#{telefono},
C_EMAILACTOR=#{email},
C_ANEXOACTOR=#{anexo},
C_LUGNACIMIENTOACTOR= #{lugarNacimiento},
C_CARGOACTOR= #{cargo},
C_IDDEPARTAMENTO = #{idDepartamento},
C_IDPROVINCIA = #{idProvincia},
C_IDDISTRITO = #{idDistrito},
C_EMPRESATIPO = #{empresaTipo},
C_ENTIDADTIPO = #{entidadTipo},
C_EMPRESAAMBITO = #{empresaAmbito},
C_OBSERVACIONES = #{observaciones},
C_TIPOPOBLACION = #{tipoPoblacion},
C_SUBTIPO1POBLACION = #{subTipo1Poblacion},
C_SUBTIPO2POBLACION = #{subTipo2Poblacion},
C_TIPOESTADO = #{tipoEstado},
C_SUBTIPO1ESTADO = #{subTipo1Estado},
C_SUBTIPO2ESTADO = #{subTipo2Estado},
C_TIPOEMPRESA = #{tipoEmpresa},
C_SUBTIPO1EMPRESA = #{subTipo1Empresa},
C_SUBTIPO2EMPRESA = #{subTipo2Empresa},
C_TIPOORGANIZACION = #{tipoOrganizacion},
C_SUBTIPO1ORGANIZACION = #{subTipo1Organizacion},
C_SUBTIPO2ORGANIZACION = #{subTipo2Organizacion},
C_SUBTIPO3EMPRESA = #{subTipo3Empresa},
C_CLASIFICACION = #{clasificacion},
C_NOMACTOR=#{nombre}
N_ID_ACTOR=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.N_ID_ACTOR, A.C_NOMACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, A.C_DNIACTOR, A.C_RUCACTOR, A.D_FECNACIMIENTOACTOR, A.C_LUGNACIMIENTOACTOR, A.C_INFOCONTACTO, A.C_CARGOACTOR, A.C_COMENT_ACTI_ACTOR, A.C_DEMAN_ACTI_ACTOR, A.C_POS_ACTI_ACTOR, A.N_NIVEL_AD FROM ( SELECT B.N_ID_ACTOR, B.C_NOMACTOR, B.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, B.C_DNIACTOR, B.C_RUCACTOR, B.D_FECNACIMIENTOACTOR, B.C_LUGNACIMIENTOACTOR, B.C_INFOCONTACTO, B.C_CARGOACTOR, B.C_COMENT_ACTI_ACTOR, B.C_DEMAN_ACTI_ACTOR, B.C_POS_ACTI_ACTOR, B.N_NIVEL_AD, ROWNUM numfila FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT D.*, C.C_COMENT_ACTI_ACTOR, C.C_DEMAN_ACTI_ACTOR, C.C_POS_ACTI_ACTOR, C.N_NIVEL_AD FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR D LEFT JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD_ACTOR C ON D.N_ID_ACTOR = C.N_ID_ACTOR ORDER BY D.N_ID_ACTOR ) B ) A WHERE a.numfila BETWEEN #{ini} AND #{fin}

SELECT A.N_ID_ACTOR, A.C_NOMACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, A.C_DNIACTOR, A.C_RUCACTOR, A.D_FECNACIMIENTOACTOR, A.C_LUGNACIMIENTOACTOR, A.C_INFOCONTACTO, A.C_CARGOACTOR FROM ( SELECT B.N_ID_ACTOR, B.C_NOMACTOR, B.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, B.C_DNIACTOR, B.C_RUCACTOR, B.D_FECNACIMIENTOACTOR, B.C_LUGNACIMIENTOACTOR, B.C_INFOCONTACTO, B.C_CARGOACTOR, ROWNUM numfila FROM ( SELECT D.* FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR D ORDER BY D.N_ID_ACTOR ) B ) A WHERE a.numfila BETWEEN #{ini} AND #{fin}

SELECT A.N_ID_ACTOR, A.C_NOMACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOMATACTOR, A.C_DNIACTOR, A.C_RUCACTOR, A.D_FECNACIMIENTOACTOR, A.C_LUGNACIMIENTOACTOR, A.C_INFOCONTACTO, A.C_CARGOACTOR, A.C_TIPOGENERAL FROM ( SELECT B.N_ID_ACTOR, B.C_NOMACTOR, B.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, B.C_APELLIDOMATACTOR, B.C_DNIACTOR, B.C_RUCACTOR, B.D_FECNACIMIENTOACTOR, B.C_LUGNACIMIENTOACTOR, B.C_INFOCONTACTO, B.C_CARGOACTOR, B.C_TIPOGENERAL, ROWNUM numfila FROM ( SELECT D.* FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR D WHERE UPPER(d.C_NOMACTOR||d.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR||d.C_APELLIDOMATACTOR) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{nombre})||'%' ORDER BY D.N_ID_ACTOR ) B ) A WHERE a.numfila BETWEEN #{ini} AND #{fin}

SELECT DISTINCT A.*, E.N_ID_CASO FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD_ACTOR B ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = B.N_ID_ACTOR INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD C ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD D ON C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = D.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO E ON E.N_ID_CASO = D.N_ID_CASO WHERE E.N_ID_CASO =#{id}
SELECT DISTINCT A.N_ID_ACTOR, A.C_NOMACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOMATACTOR, A.C_DNIACTOR FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR A
SELECT DISTINCT A.N_ID_ACTOR, A.C_NOMACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOMATACTOR, A.C_DNIACTOR FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR A WHERE A.C_TIPOGENERAL IN ('EM','EN')

SELECT DISTINCT N_ID_ACTOR, C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, C_APELLIDOMATACTOR, C_DNIACTOR, C_RUCACTOR, D_FECNACIMIENTOACTOR, C_SEXO, C_DIRECCIONACTOR, C_TELEFONOACTOR, C_EMAILACTOR, C_ANEXOACTOR, C_LUGNACIMIENTOACTOR, C_CARGOACTOR, C_IDDEPARTAMENTO, C_IDPROVINCIA, C_IDDISTRITO, C_NOMACTOR FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR
C_DNIACTOR =#{dni}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR
C_DNIACTOR =#{dni}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR
C_RUCACTOR =#{ruc}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.N_ID_ACTOR) FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD_ACTOR B ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = B.N_ID_ACTOR INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD C ON C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD WHERE C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD =#{id}

SELECT DISTINCT A.N_ID_ACTOR, A.C_NOMACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOMATACTOR, A.C_DNIACTOR, A.C_SEXO, A.C_DIRECCIONACTOR, A.C_TELEFONOACTOR, A.C_EMAILACTOR, A.C_ANEXOACTOR, A.D_FECNACIMIENTOACTOR, A.C_RUCACTOR, A.C_TIPOGENERAL FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD_ACTOR B ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = B.N_ID_ACTOR INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD C ON C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD WHERE C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD =#{id}

select DISTINCT A.N_ID_ACTOR, A.C_NOMACTOR, A.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, A.C_DNIACTOR, E.N_ID_CASO, CASE WHEN F.N_NIVELINTENSIDAD IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE F.N_NIVELINTENSIDAD END N_NIVELINTENSIDAD FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD_ACTOR B ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = B.N_ID_ACTOR INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD C ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD D ON C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = D.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO E ON E.N_ID_CASO = D.N_ID_CASO LEFT JOIN SIMCO_ANALISIS_ACT_INTENSIDAD F ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = F.N_ID_ACTOR AND E.N_ID_CASO = F.N_ID_CASO WHERE E.N_ID_CASO =#{id} ORDER BY A.N_ID_ACTOR

SELECT C.*, B.C_INDTIPOACTORACUERDO FROM SIMCO_REG_DET_ACTA_ACUERDO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTOR_ACUERDO B ON A.N_ID_ACUERDO = B.N_ID_ACUERDO INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTOR C ON B.N_ID_ACTOR = C.N_ID_ACTOR WHERE A.N_ID_ACUERDO = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR WHERE C_DNIACTOR =#{dni}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR WHERE C_DNIACTOR =#{ruc}

SELECT distinct C.*, A.C_NOMACTIVIDAD, E.C_NOMCASO FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD_ACTOR B ON A.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTOR C ON B.N_ID_ACTOR = C.N_ID_ACTOR INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD D ON A.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = D.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO E ON D.N_ID_CASO = E.N_ID_CASO WHERE A.C_USUREGISTRO = #{value}

SELECT A.*, B.C_TIPO TIPO_ACTOR_CASO FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTOR B ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = B.N_ID_ACTOR INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO C ON C.N_ID_CASO = B.N_ID_CASO WHERE C.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C.C_CODIGOCASO = #{value}
